system.requirements:
Tier 2; Ballistic Skill 40 
Aptitudes: Ballistic Skill, Finesse
system.effect: When making a Ranged Attack against a Vehicle, the character adds their Ballistic Skill Bonus to the Penetration value of their weapon.

description.value: When making a Ranged Attack against a Vehicle, the character adds their Ballistic Skill Bonus to the Penetration value of their weapon.
